name: Tony's Terrible Time
description:
This game is the second project I have created for my game-dev class at WMU. In this project you will (hopefully) notice my knowledge and comfort with Godot is improving drastically, as well as the art (because I didn't do the art lol). This game is a simple platformer, with projectile shooting, and jumping mechanics that utilize the players odd hitbox.

The concept of the game is Tony is stuck in the city surrounded by his greatest fears (rats, dogs, and his own car). He has to fight his was from underground into the sewers, all the way to the clouds where he will make his escape. 

Development/Programming: Dylan Hedblad(Me)

Art/Assets: Josh Potts

Sound/Soundtrack: Antonio "Tony" Colella
